text:
Just fetched my first folder from a portal. Wow that was fast and easy, no idea why but I expected that to take longer. Just read through the available commands. this is looking slick. Awesome work guys!

I can tell this is the foundation for some really powerful/awesome stuff, and it will make some things possible that weren’t previously or were prohibitively difficult.

Feature request - I realize most sane people won’t work this way so it’s not a top priority feature: add type `dnd` to create command. to generate a new drag n drop template.

Again probably not something most people will need often, and the work-around is just as easy(create in design manager)
Hi guys, would like to ask for assistance. I am using the this command: npx hscms upload --portal=<name> <src> <dest> to upload a css file but I am getting an error. :disappointed:
